products.name: Nikon D7500 DSLR Camera with AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-140mm f/3.5-5.6G ED VR Lens
products.description: When shooting fast-moving subjects or critical moments, you need a camera that can keep pace. Utilising a Multi-CAM 3500 II’s autofocus (AF) sensor module with detection down to -3 EV, the D7500 captures every detail in sharp focus, even in low light situations. The 51-point AF system covers a wide area of frame, including 15 cross-type sensors offering higher detection strength, for superior subject detection and acquisition. To keep up with the action, the EXPEED 5 image-processing engine and an increased buffer size gives the D7500 the power to shoot up to approximately 8 frames per second for approximately 50 frames in RAW or 100 frames in JPEG. Increase your efficiency and avoid overblown highlights from strong light sources, such as the setting sun, with the highlight-weighted metering mode-a first for the D7000 series DSLRs.

products.description: Whether you enjoy playing solo or multiplayer games online, the Sony PS5 DualSense Wireless Controller can offer responsive gaming controls. Its dual actuators offer physically responsive feedback to your gaming motions. In addition, these dynamic vibrations can mimic a range of sensations, such as the feel of several environments and the recoil of a plethora of weapons. Moreover, with this controller's adaptive triggers, your on-screen actions can have a realistic effect, whether you're releasing a severely constricted bowstring or slamming on the brakes of a fast-moving car.
